Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides that taxpayers in the city of New York with certain lower income levels shall not be subject to city personal income taxation
Summary: Provides that taxpayers in the city of New York with certain lower income levels shall not be subject to city personal income taxation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to making certain taxpayers exempt from the city personal income tax of the city of New York
